```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/2410005001-eng.csv", skip = 8, sep=",")
data <- data[2,]

data <- data %>% gather(key = "date", value = "travellers")
data <- data[-1, ]
data$travellers <- sapply(data$travellers, gsub, pattern = ",", replacement= "")
data$travellers <- as.integer(data$travellers)
```
